title: Highly efficient aramid fiber supported polypropylene membranes modified with reduced graphene oxide based metallic nanocomposites: antimicrobial and antiviral capabilities
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16421-16431
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00724G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kiran Mustafa, Nadeem Iqbal, Sajjad Ahmad, Sadia Iqbal, Mashallah Rezakazemi, Francis Verpoort, Javaria Kanwal, Sara Musaddiq
Polypropylene hybrid membranes reinforced with aramid fiber modified with metallic nanoparticles and reduced graphene oxide showed potent antimicrobial and antiviral capabilities. These membranes hold promise for advancing water treatment practices.
